Docs.summary: Represents a property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

Docs.param: The name of the property that the represents.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintJobStatus> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.JobStatus%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "JobStatus", not "Status" or "Jobstatus".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintJobStatus> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.JobStatus%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "JobStatus", not "Status" or "Jobstatus".
